languages.text: "Ваша Светлость, данный серф был арестован по подозрению в краже запчастей. При обыске у него были обнаружены детали, переделанные под сборку неизвестного оружия, а также символика, на которую вы дали указание обращать внимание". {n}Иокаста взирает на добычу с хищным азартом.{/n}

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, this serf was arrested on suspicion of stealing machine components. He was searched and found to be carrying a strange weapon built from the parts. We also discovered symbols matching the description you provided." {n}Sauerback looks at her prey with vicious excitement.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость, данный серф был арестован по подозрению в краже запчастей. При обыске у него были обнаружены детали, переделанные под сборку неизвестного оружия, а также символика, на которую вы дали указание обращать внимание". {n}Иокаста взирает на добычу с хищным азартом.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, this serf was arrested on suspicion of stealing machine components. Parts repurposed for assembling an unknown weapon were found on his person. There is also the symbol that matches the description you provided us." {n}Sauerback looks at her prey with vicious excitement.{/n}

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, this serf was arrested on suspicion of stealing machine components. Parts repurposed for assembling an unknown weapon were found on his person. There is also the symbol that matches the description you provided us." {n}Sauerback looks at her prey with vicious excitement.{/n}

We also discovered symbols matching the description you provided." {n}Sauerback looks at her prey with vicious excitement.{/n}

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, this serf was arrested on suspicion of stealing machine components. He was searched and found to be carrying a strange weapon built from the parts. We also discovered symbols matching the description you provided." {n}Sauerback looks at her prey with vicious excitement.{/n}

languages.text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, arrestamos a este siervo bajo sospecha de robar componentes de maquinaria. Al cachearlo le encontramos un arma extraña construida con esas piezas. También hallamos símbolos que coinciden con la descripción que nos proporcionó». {n}Sauerback mira a su presa con un entusiasmo salvaje.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, this serf was arrested on suspicion of stealing machine components. He was searched and found to be carrying a strange weapon built from the parts. We also discovered symbols matching the description you provided." {n}Sauerback looks at her prey with vicious excitement.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, arrestamos a este siervo bajo sospecha de robar componentes de maquinaria. Al cachearlo le encontramos un arma extraña construida con esas piezas. También hallamos símbolos que coinciden con la descripción que nos proporcionó». {n}Sauerback mira a su presa con un entusiasmo salvaje.{/n}

languages.text: 「陛下、この農奴は機械の部品を盗んだ容疑で逮捕されました。身体検査をしたところ、その部品から作られた奇妙な武器を所持していることが判明しました。また、陛下の説明と一致するシンボルも発見しました」{n}ザウアーバックは、恐ろしくギラリとした目で獲物を見つめる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, this serf was arrested on suspicion of stealing machine components. He was searched and found to be carrying a strange weapon built from the parts. We also discovered symbols matching the description you provided." {n}Sauerback looks at her prey with vicious excitement.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、この農奴は機械の部品を盗んだ容疑で逮捕されました。身体検査をしたところ、その部品から作られた奇妙な武器を所持していることが判明しました。また、陛下の説明と一致するシンボルも発見しました」{n}ザウアーバックは、恐ろしくギラリとした目で獲物を見つめる。{/n}

languages.text: “大人，这个仆役涉嫌偷窃机器部件而被捕。我们搜了他的身，搜出了这把用机器零件制成的古怪武器，还发现了与您的描述相符的印记。”{n}苏尔贝克盯着她的猎物，目光中充满了恶毒的兴奋。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, this serf was arrested on suspicion of stealing machine components. He was searched and found to be carrying a strange weapon built from the parts. We also discovered symbols matching the description you provided." {n}Sauerback looks at her prey with vicious excitement.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “大人，这个仆役涉嫌偷窃机器部件而被捕。我们搜了他的身，搜出了这把用机器零件制成的古怪武器，还发现了与您的描述相符的印记。”{n}苏尔贝克盯着她的猎物，目光中充满了恶毒的兴奋。{/n}

languages.text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, dieser Sklave wurde verhaftet, weil er unter Verdacht steht, Maschinenkomponenten gestohlen zu haben. Wir haben ihn durchsucht und eine merkwürdige Waffe gefunden, die aus den Teilen gebaut wurde. Überdies fanden wir Symbole, die Eurer Beschreibung entsprechen." {n}Sauerback betrachtet ihre Beute mit grausamer Vorfreude.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, this serf was arrested on suspicion of stealing machine components. He was searched and found to be carrying a strange weapon built from the parts. We also discovered symbols matching the description you provided." {n}Sauerback looks at her prey with vicious excitement.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, dieser Sklave wurde verhaftet, weil er unter Verdacht steht, Maschinenkomponenten gestohlen zu haben. Wir haben ihn durchsucht und eine merkwürdige Waffe gefunden, die aus den Teilen gebaut wurde. Überdies fanden wir Symbole, die Eurer Beschreibung entsprechen." {n}Sauerback betrachtet ihre Beute mit grausamer Vorfreude.{/n}

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie, ce serf est soupçonné de vol de composants mécaniques. Quand nous l'avons fouillé, il était en possession d'une arme étrange bricolée avec les pièces incriminées. Nous avons également découvert des symboles correspondant à la description fournie par vos soins. » {n}Sauerback regarde sa proie avec la convoitise d'un prédateur.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, this serf was arrested on suspicion of stealing machine components. He was searched and found to be carrying a strange weapon built from the parts. We also discovered symbols matching the description you provided." {n}Sauerback looks at her prey with vicious excitement.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie, ce serf est soupçonné de vol de composants mécaniques. Quand nous l'avons fouillé, il était en possession d'une arme étrange bricolée avec les pièces incriminées. Nous avons également découvert des symboles correspondant à la description fournie par vos soins. » {n}Sauerback regarde sa proie avec la convoitise d'un prédateur.{/n}

languages.text: "Bu köle, makine aksamları çaldığı şüphesi üzerine tutuklandı {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Üzeri arandı ve yedek parçalardan yapılma, tuhaf bir silah taşıdığı ortaya çıktı. Ayrıca belirttiğiniz tanıma uyan semboller de keşfettik." {n}Sauerback, gaddarca bir heyecanla avına bakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, this serf was arrested on suspicion of stealing machine components. We also discovered symbols matching the description you provided." {n}Sauerback looks at her prey with vicious excitement.{/n}
